name: ColorScaleConditionalFormat
description: Represents an IconSet criteria for conditional formatting.

properties.name: threeColorScale
properties.description: If true the color scale will have three points (minimum, midpoint, maximum), otherwise it will have two (minimum, maximum).

properties.name: criteria
properties.description: The criteria of the color scale. Midpoint is optional when using a two point color scale.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
